org.apache.jackrabbit.core.observation
Class EventState

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.jackrabbit.core.observation.EventState
class EventState
extends Object

The EventState class encapsulates the session independent state of an Event.

Version:
$Revision: 1.6 $

createChildNodeAdded

public static EventState createChildNodeAdded(String parentUUID,
                                              QName childName,
                                              javax.jcr.Session session)
Creates a new Event of type EventType.CHILD_NODE_ADDED.

Parameters:
parentUUID - the uuid of the parent node associated with this EventState.
childName - the qualified name of the child node that was added.
session - the session that added the node.
Returns:
an EventState instance.
